reviews.review: very good, %70 of the players are very nice and help you out if you're new to the game, while the other %30 will insult you and be very toxic. The games really fun even if you're bad, and once you learn bullet spreads of your favorite guns; learn the callouts, and learn the maps it's even fun. CS:GO is a must buy for all steam members and fps fans.
